description: Gavin went over to Scott's house to hangout. Gavin had heard around town that Scott fucked with dudes a few times. He wanted to see if it was true. Gavin had been thinking curiously about what it would be like to be with another dude. So Gavin decided, that, if Scott did fuck around with dudes, then he would give it a try, with Scott. To his, shocked surprise, Scott was totally into other dudes. Though he says he still fucks chicks, regardless, Gavin got exactly what he wanted. Watch these two hot, bi teen dudes with huge dicks fuck each other. And unload globs of white, salty, hot teen boy seed all over each other.
title: Man In My Mouth
